column4: Hi, do I have to set up a user for ftp or will already added users automatically be able to use ftp with their accounts?
system users should have access to ftp unless the configuration of the server restricts their access
I was asking about ftp accounts earlier
there is no tool to do that
if you want to disable some services you have to manually edit the scripts in /etc/init
so if I don't want a service to run, I can move the file in /etc/init.d/ elsewhere?
I would rather comment out the "start on...." line
I misread you, thought you wanted to delete the script
thanks. It's either that or have to go with debian for awhile. :-/
